DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine efficacy , safety , tolerability different dose JNJ-27018966 compare placebo treatment patient irritable bowel syndrome diarrhea ( IBS-d ) .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy , Safety , Tolerability JNJ-27018966 Treatment Irritable Bowel Syndrome With Diarrhea
DOC.criteria: Key Patient diagnosis IBS Rome III criterion subtype diarrhea Female patient must : postmenopausal , define amenorrhea least 2 year Prescreening , surgically sterile ( hysterectomy bilateral oophorectomy , tubal ligation , otherwise incapable pregnancy ) , abstinent , sexually active , practice effective method birth control . Key Patient diagnosis IBS Rome III criterion subtype constipation , mixed IBS , unsubtyped IBS Patient history inflammatory immunemediated gastrointestinal ( GI ) disorder include inflammatory bowel disease ( ie , Crohn 's disease , ulcerative colitis ) celiac disease Patient history diverticulitis within 6 month prior Prescreening Patient history intestinal obstruction , stricture , toxic megacolon , GI perforation , fecal impaction , gastric banding , bariatric surgery , adhesion , ischemic colitis , impaired intestinal circulation ( eg , aortoiliac disease ) , thrombophlebitis major vein , hypercoagulable state . Other protocolspecific eligibility criterion may apply .
